plot: Becki - a world renowned surfer, is tragically blinded in a near-fatal hit and run. Supported by her husband, Nico, Becki vows to return to surfing and regain her sight, until a shocking transaction threatens to derail everything.
title: Balance
plot_es: Becki - a world renowned surfer, is tragically blinded in a near-fatal hit and run. Supported by her husband, Nico, Becki vows to return to surfing and regain her sight, until a shocking transaction threatens to derail everything.
plot_en: Becki - a world renowned surfer, is tragically blinded in a near-fatal hit and run. Supported by her husband, Nico, Becki vows to return to surfing and regain her sight, until a shocking transaction threatens to derail everything.
